title: Renovated Oak Park Studio Apartment! (1116-108)
posting_body: Stunning Studio apartment in meticulously maintained and managed court-yard building.
Excellent Oak Park location that offers residents a convenient and walk-able lifestyle.
The Interior
- Well designed floor plan with good sized rooms.
- Newly updated kitchen including stainless appliances, granite countertops, under-mount sinks, and plenty of cabinet and counter space.
- Hardwood floors throughout.
- Ceiling fans throughout.
The Location
- Three block walk to downtown Oak Park, the CTA Green Line, and the Metra train.
- Easy access to the Eisenhower Expressway (I-290).
- Walk score of 92 (“walkers paradise”).
- Quiet and safe block in a very desirable residential neighborhood.
- Excellent Oak Park school district.
Amenities & Misc.
- Onsite laundry.
- Dog (under 50 lbs.) and cats allowed.
Professionally managed by M&M Property Management, Inc.
Contact Erika at 224-297-1042.
All M&M properties are smoke free.
To view a summary of fees, visit this link: <URL>
$75 application fee required for each applicant over the age of 18.
Minimum credit score of 625, gross monthly income of at least 3x the rent amount, and good landlord referrals are required for application approval.
*Meeting these requirements does not guarantee application approval.
For more details regarding our application approval criteria, please visit this link <URL>
**Pictures shown here are to be considered typical of all units in this property of this layout.
Details such as lighting/plumbing fixtures, counter top finish and flooring style/color may vary from unit to unit.
